name: lote10x30-10apartamentos
description: Hub Central de Projetos - Lote 10x30 - 10 Apartamentos

scripts.build: cd _source/5D && npm install && npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(src,dest){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});const entries=fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true});for(let entry of entries){const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name);const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}}copyDir('dist','../../');"

author: Bonfim Imobili√°ria e Engenharia
